item.title: Play Halo3
item.dc:creator: @JukuG JukuG
item.description:
@JukuG wrote:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:41, topic:175685”][quote author=JukuG link=topic=236298.msg2014819#msg2014819 date=1201333123]

Everyone sounds weird to themselves. My voice ends up too deep and dopey, and i find myself talking with a Dudley accent and dialect.

Aha, my voice is faggy.
Which is probably 'caused by the gayness.

I’ll go on at random times and see when everyone’s on.
Time differences.
[/quote][quote author=JukuG link=topic=236298.msg2014646#msg2014646 date=1201329536]
Nah you probably suck

I know it has some relevance in a sexual way but no direct relevance to my post.
Talking to me?

Why the hell would it be directed at you? Don’t think too highly of yourself

Anyways, I more of a CoD player. Halo 3 lost it’s fun after I started CoD.
[/quote]
Well it was after my post and no quote… shrugs
I’m going to rent CoD, everyone’s making a fuss about it so i guess i shall see.[/quote]

Trust me it’s worth it. I got hooked instantly, it’s more p2p based imo, which makes it a lot better.

Read full topic

item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

[quote=“Greeny, post:31, topic:175685”]To be honest I only talk when I’m on with you guys. I’ve discovered that my voice always sounds weird over any recording device so I’m not too fussed anymore, I just feel weird talking when other people are in the house and I’m talking to a computer/xbox360 xD

Anyone tonight, HUGE game taking place, I’m having some mates over parents are out till 2am. So there will be 4 LegendGreenys hopefully xD[/quote]
